question: Which nation's philosophical and cultural movement is "Nadaism"?
explanation: Nadaism was an artistic and philosophical counterculture movement in Colombia. It was active in Colombia from 1958 to 1964. This movement got its inspiration from nihilism, existentialism and works of Fernando Gonzalez Ochoa, a Colombian writer and philosopher. This movement was founded by Gonzalo Arango, a Colombian writer. This movement has emerged largely as a reaction to "La Violencia".
